name: Pop Goes the Weapon
description:
You never know what your going to get until you accidentally kill yourself with it.

In "Pop Goes the Weapon", you fight your way through a dungeons killing smiles. Drop or throw weapon capsules to deal some serious carnage and rack up the score! But here's the catch: the weapon deployed is random, so pay attention to what you get! Your own weapons can kill you just as easily as slimes!

Note: the game lags a bit in the browser, so if that bothers you, download the game for your desired OS and play locally for a smoother experience!

Background Music: https://opengameart.org/content/4-chiptunes-adventure (public domain license)
